name: MulActionTensor
declaration:
/-- A multiplicative action on a tensor structure (e.g. the action of the Lorentz
group on real Lorentz tensors). -/
class MulActionTensor {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] (G : Type) [Monoid G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) : Type

name: TensorStructure.rep_tprod
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tprod {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) (f : (i : X) → 𝓣.ColorModule (cX i)) : ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((PiTensorProduct.tprod R) f) =
  (PiTensorProduct.tprod R) fun x => ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule (cX x)) g) (f x)

name: TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} {cY : Y → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) : ↑(LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY)) ∘ₗ (TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g =
  TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ∘ₗ
    ↑(LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY))

name: MulActionTensor.repColorModule
declaration:
/-- For each color `μ` a representation of `G` on `ColorModule μ`. -/
def MulActionTensor.repColorModule {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Monoid G] {𝓣 : TensorStructure R} [self : MulActionTensor G 𝓣] (μ : 𝓣.Color) : Representation R G (𝓣.ColorModule μ)

name: TensorStructure.rep_mapIso
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_mapIso {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {Y : Type} {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} {cY : Y → 𝓣.Color} (e : X ≃ Y) (h : cX = cY ∘ ⇑e) (g : G) : (TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g ∘ₗ ↑(TensorStructure.mapIso 𝓣 e h) =
  ↑(TensorStructure.mapIso 𝓣 e h) ∘ₗ (TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g

name: MulActionTensor.compHom
declaration:
/-- The `MulActionTensor` defined by restriction along a group homomorphism. -/
def MulActionTensor.compHom {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} {H : Type} [Group G] [Group H] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] (f : H →* G) : MulActionTensor H 𝓣

name: TensorStructure.contrRightAux_contrDual_equivariant_tmul
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.contrRightAux_contrDual_equivariant_tmul {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {μ : 𝓣.Color} {ν : 𝓣.Color} (g : G) (m : TensorProduct R (𝓣.ColorModule ν) (𝓣.ColorModule μ)) (x : 𝓣.ColorModule (𝓣.τ μ)) : (TensorStructure.contrRightAux (𝓣.contrDual μ))
    ((TensorProduct.map ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule ν) g) ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule μ) g)) m ⊗ₜ[R]
      ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule (𝓣.τ μ)) g) x) =
  ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule ν) g) ((TensorStructure.contrRightAux (𝓣.contrDual μ)) (m ⊗ₜ[R] x))

name: TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} {cY : Y → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) : ↑(TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY) ∘ₗ
    TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) =
  (TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g ∘ₗ ↑(TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY)

name: TensorStructure.contrDual_equivariant_tmul
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.contrDual_equivariant_tmul {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {μ : 𝓣.Color} (g : G) (x : 𝓣.ColorModule μ) (y : 𝓣.ColorModule (𝓣.τ μ)) : (𝓣.contrDual μ) (((MulActionTensor.repColorModule μ) g) x ⊗ₜ[R] ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule (𝓣.τ μ)) g) y) =
  (𝓣.contrDual μ) (x ⊗ₜ[R] y)

name: TensorStructure.rep_mapIso_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_mapIso_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {Y : Type} {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} {cY : Y → 𝓣.Color} (e : X ≃ Y) (h : cX = cY ∘ ⇑e) (g : G) (x : TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX) : (TensorStructure.mapIso 𝓣 e h) (((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) x) =
  ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((TensorStructure.mapIso 𝓣 e h) x)

name: TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv_equivariant_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} {cY : Y → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorProduct R (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX) (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cY)) : (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY)
    ((TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g)) x) =
  ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY) x)

name: TensorStructure.rep
declaration:
/-- The representation of the group `G` on the vector space of tensors. -/
def TensorStructure.rep {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} : Representation R G (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX)

name: MulActionTensor.trivial
declaration:
/-- The trivial `MulActionTensor` defined via trivial representations. -/
def MulActionTensor.trivial {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) : MulActionTensor G 𝓣

name: TensorStructure.repColorModule_colorModuleCast
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.repColorModule_colorModuleCast {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {μ : 𝓣.Color} {ν : 𝓣.Color} (h : μ = ν) (g : G) : (MulActionTensor.repColorModule ν) g ∘ₗ ↑(TensorStructure.colorModuleCast 𝓣 h) =
  ↑(TensorStructure.colorModuleCast 𝓣 h) ∘ₗ (MulActionTensor.repColorModule μ) g

name: TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_symm_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} {cY : Y → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 (Sum.elim cX cY)) : (LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY)) (((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) x) =
  (TensorProduct.map ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g))
    ((LinearEquiv.symm (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY)) x)

name: TensorStructure.rep_lid
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_lid {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) : ↑(TensorProduct.lid R (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX)) ∘ₗ TensorProduct.map LinearMap.id ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) =
  (TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g ∘ₗ ↑(TensorProduct.lid R (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX))

name: TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_tmul
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_tensoratorEquiv_tmul {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {Y : Type} [DecidableEq X] [DecidableEq Y] {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} {cY : Y → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX) (y : TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cY) : (TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY) (((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) x ⊗ₜ[R] ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) y) =
  ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) ((TensorStructure.tensoratorEquiv 𝓣 cX cY) (x ⊗ₜ[R] y))

name: MulActionTensor.mk
declaration:
ctor MulActionTensor.mk {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Monoid G] {𝓣 : TensorStructure R} (repColorModule : (μ : 𝓣.Color) → Representation R G (𝓣.ColorModule μ)) (contrDual_inv : ∀ (μ : 𝓣.Color) (g : G),
  𝓣.contrDual μ ∘ₗ TensorProduct.map ((repColorModule μ) g) ((repColorModule (𝓣.τ μ)) g) = 𝓣.contrDual μ) (metric_inv : ∀ (μ : 𝓣.Color) (g : G), (TensorProduct.map ((repColorModule μ) g) ((repColorModule μ) g)) (𝓣.metric μ) = 𝓣.metric μ) : MulActionTensor G 𝓣

name: TensorStructure.colorModuleCast_equivariant_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.colorModuleCast_equivariant_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {μ : 𝓣.Color} {ν : 𝓣.Color} (h : μ = ν) (g : G) (x : 𝓣.ColorModule μ) : (TensorStructure.colorModuleCast 𝓣 h) (((MulActionTensor.repColorModule μ) g) x) =
  ((MulActionTensor.repColorModule ν) g) ((TensorStructure.colorModuleCast 𝓣 h) x)

name: MulActionTensor.metric_inv
MulActionTensor.contrDual_inv
TensorStructure.rep_lid_apply
declaration:
theorem TensorStructure.rep_lid_apply {R : Type} [CommSemiring R] {G : Type} [Group G] (𝓣 : TensorStructure R) [MulActionTensor G 𝓣] {X : Type} {cX : X → 𝓣.Color} (g : G) (x : TensorProduct R R (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX)) : (TensorProduct.lid R (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX)) ((TensorProduct.map LinearMap.id ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g)) x) =
  ((TensorStructure.rep 𝓣) g) (↑(TensorProduct.lid R (TensorStructure.Tensor 𝓣 cX)) x)
